#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

start_sources()
# -- audiocommon.waf_files --
sources_platform(ALL)
add_sources("NoUberFile"
	SOURCE_GROUP "Root"
		"DebugStyle.h"
		"FileInfo.h"
		"IEnvironmentConnection.h"
		"IEvent.h"
		"IFile.h"
		"IImpl.h"
		"IListener.h"
		"IObject.h"
		"IParameterConnection.h"
		"ISettingConnection.h"
		"ISwitchStateConnection.h"
		"ITriggerConnection.h"
		"ITriggerInfo.h"
		"Logger.h"
		"PoolObject.h"
		"PoolObject_impl.h"
)

end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

CryFileContainer(CryAudioCommon SOLUTION_FOLDER "CryEngine/Audio")

# PERSONAL EDITS Only for VS (As from https://github.com/CRYTEK/CRYENGINE/pull/169/files)
if (${CMAKE_GENERATOR} MATCHES "^Visual Studio")
	# Fix to add CryCommon includes in VS ide
	configure_file ("CryAudioCommon.vcxproj.user.in" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/CryAudioCommon.vcxproj.user")
	configure_file ("CryAudioCommon.props" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/CryAudioCommon.props")
endif()
